---
name: Feature request
about: Suggest ideas for new effects, parameters, or something else entirely!
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

## Feature Type
What kind of feature is this? A new effect or category of effects? more expansive props? Compatibility with some other library or tech stack? Something else?

## Feature Description
Please explain what this feature is, how it would work, and in what circumstances.

## Examples
If you can, please provide an example or examples of how you would want it to be used or how it would appear. This can be in the form of text, pseudocode, images, videos, external links, or anything else that helps communicate your idea!

## Additional Information / References
Any additional information or context that you think would be helpful!
